tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  intervention_id INT,
  trial_location TEXT,
  trial_start_date DATE,
  trial_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE trial_results ( 
	result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
	study_id INT, 
	effectiveness FLOAT, 
	confidence_interval STRING, 
	FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES cost_data(study_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE cost_effectiveness ( 
	result_id INT, 
	intervention_id INT, 
	cost_effectiveness_ratio FLOAT, 
	PRIMARY KEY (result_id, intervention_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY (result_id) REFERENCES trial_results(result_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY (intervention_id) REFERENCES intervention_details(intervention_id) 
);
